name: Hillbilly Elegy
description: An urgent phone call pulls a Yale Law student back to his Ohio hometown, where he reflects on three generations of family history and his own future.

review.author: Pauluselago
review.heading: The Story of America the media doesn't show us
review.reviewBody:
Hillbilly Elegy is a great sad movie, it kept me interested through out. The acting was amazing and the story was told almost to perfection.

This is a side of America I rarely get to see as an African. The battle of drug addiction and poverty, is a tough one and anyone that makes it deserves praise.

Amazing movie.
